Manager for ignored file model.

IgnoredFileManager(MainDirectoryService)

Initializes a new instance of the IgnoredFileManager class and all it's properties.

public IgnoredFileManager(MainDirectoryService mainDirectoryService)

Parameters

mainDirectoryService MainDirectoryService

The main directory service that newly created IgnoredFileService object will by connected with.

Remarks

Sets SelectedItem to -1 and Service to newly created IgnoredFileService object connected with specified MainDirectoryService instance.
